name: Bighead
quotes: Thank you so much. That's exactly the response I was looking for. I feel very confident I will not be getting into the launch today. Thank you for not helping. Don't let me through.

name: Dinesh
quotes: Is this gonna work? Did we just make billions of dollars?!

name: Erlich
quotes: However angry he is, I am one-tenth as angry. Because one of the ten million would've been mine... because I own ten percent...

name: Gavin
quotes: Since leaving Hooli, I've co-authored 37 adult romance novels. Fondly, Margeaux. The Lighthouse Dancer. Cold Ice Cream and Hot Kisses. Over here, The Prince of Puget Sound. Uh, and lastly, His Hazel Glance. All international best sellers.

name: Gilfoyle
quotes: `It’s not magic, it’s talent and sweat. People like me ensure your packets get delivered unsniffed. So what do I do? I make sure that one bad config on one key component doesn’t bankrupt the entire f*cking company. That’s what the f*ck I do.`

name: Jared
quotes: Okay, is this a good thing or a bad thing? Someone tell me how to feel.

name: Monica
quotes: I know who f*cking Frank Herbert is.

name: Peter
quotes: I was never enjoying it. I only eat it for the nutrients.

name: Richard
quotes: Once more people show up, the network effect will take over, and it will stabilize, I promise.

name: Russ
quotes: Is that beer? No, you're not drinking that piss. We drink my piss! Tres Comas!

name: Jin-Yiang
quotes: Monica, two men are talking business. You can find your broom and fly away.
